body_html:
@ekelsen, as far as I understand, Theano also uses cuDNN, but they still have settings (in .theanorc):

[dnn.conv]

algo_bwd_data=deterministic
algo_bwd_filter=deterministic

that work with convolutions in a slower but deterministic way.
body_text:
@ekelsen, as far as I understand, Theano also uses cuDNN, but they still have settings (in .theanorc):
[dnn.conv]

algo_bwd_data=deterministic
algo_bwd_filter=deterministic

that work with convolutions in a slower but deterministic way.
body:
@ekelsen, as far as I understand, Theano also uses cuDNN, but they still have settings (in .theanorc):
```
[dnn.conv]

algo_bwd_data=deterministic
algo_bwd_filter=deterministic
```
that [work with convolutions in a slower but deterministic way](http://deeplearning.net/software/theano/library/sandbox/cuda/dnn.html).
